solution_line_template: Since she works {work_days_per_week} days a week, she earns {work_days_per_week} x ${daily_regular_pay} = $<<{work_days_per_week}*{daily_regular_pay}={weekly_regular_pay}>>{weekly_regular_pay} per week.
She gets an additional {overtime_hours_per_day} x ${hourly_wage} = $<<{overtime_hours_per_day}*{hourly_wage}={daily_overtime_pay}>>{daily_overtime_pay} per day for the overtime pay.
She earns a total of ${daily_overtime_pay} x {work_days_per_week} = $<<{daily_overtime_pay}*{work_days_per_week}={weekly_overtime_pay}>>{weekly_overtime_pay} additional pay for her weekly overtime.
